description.value:
Your connection to the domain grows stronger, granting you further power. You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Advanced Blessing. You always have two 3rd-level spells determined by your Domain prepared. You can cast these spells using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level.

  • Light Domain. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.BP3GCwa66IAw1yTG]{Daylight}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ztgcdrWPshKRpFd0]{Fireball}
  • Trickery Domain. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.6g3WLOZ2u0EbaLAd]{Hypnotic Pattern,} @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.aU62xVUBYkAQWIHv]{Nondetection}
  • War Domain. Crusader's Mantle, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.uCud2s4TjMfjiXUb]{Spirit Guardians}
